itemInfo.itemDesc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Flax.

item.name: Flax
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be Produced at Moretti Plantation.

item.name: Shabby Wagon Cover
item.desc:
A cover for a wagon.

- Can be Installed on: Wagon

It can be enhanced with a Black Stone (Armor).

item.name: Ultimate Incense Trinket
item.desc: An Incense Trinket developed to its maximum potential.\n\n- Repair to Max. Durability: Incense Trinket of Crimson Flame, Incense Trinket of Destruction, Incense Trinket of Temptation, Incense Trinket

item.name: Incense Trinket of Temptation
item.desc: The energy of Temptation is contained within this Incense Trinket.\n\n- Repair to Max. Durability: Incense Trinket of Temptation, Incense Trinket

item.name: Incense Trinket of Destruction
item.desc: The energy of Destruction is contained within this Incense Trinket.\n\n- Repair to Max. Durability: Incense Trinket of Destruction, Incense Trinket

item.name: Incense Trinket of Crimson Flame
item.desc: The energy of Crimson Flame is contained within this Incense Trinket.\n\n- Repair to Max. Durability: Incense Trinket of Crimson Flame, Incense Trinket

item.name: Incense Trinket
item.desc: A trinket with a pouch full of incense.

item.name: Flax Fabric
item.desc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Grinding Flax Thread. It requires the knowledge of Grinding: Beginner.

※ Find Ornella in Heidel and complete the Materials for Equipment Repair Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the Quest for Beginner Processing knowledge, achieve Gathering Level 14 or higher and visit Ficy in Heidel to complete the corresponding Quest. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Square Basket with Cover
item.desc: A square straw basket with a lid.

item.name: Two-Handled Basket
item.desc: A straw basket with two handles.

item.name: Straw Basket With Handles
item.desc: A straw basket with a handle.
